actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to provide that U.S. industries shall have the right of first refusal on nuclear fuels and materials manufactured in the United States.

summary.text: Provides that United States industries shall have the right of first refusal on nuclear fuels and materials manufactured in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that U.S. industries shall have the right of first refusal on nuclear fuels and materials manufactured in the United States.
